user_request: see creations saved in the google photos
screen_desc: The screenshot displays a list of categories for organizing and searching photos in a mobile app, likely Google Photos. The options include "Videos," "Movies," "Animations," "Collages," "Creations," "PhotoScan," and "Motion Photos." A search bar is also visible at the top to help users find specific content. Additionally, there is a "Show less" option at the bottom.
